Details

  • -Order the product 3-4 days before your due date.
  • - Customizations are possible based on customer request.

item.excerpt:encoded: Vitrine products are guaranteed to benefit from the highest quality products and the most trusted brands around the globe. Our main intention is to gain our customers trust and make them a secure and win-win shopping experience. We may not be the best but we are trying hard to be the best.

item.excerpt:encoded: Vitrine products are guaranteed to benefit from the highest quality products and the most trusted brands around the globe. Our main intention is to gain our customers trust and make them a secure and win-win shopping experience. We may not be the best but we are trying hard to be the best.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: If you liked this product don't hesitate to buy it. The material is beautiful and durable, at the same time it is suitable for any occasion you might want to attend.
I bought it as a present but the packaging was not as beautiful as I requested. I still vote 4 stars because the product itself was amazing.
The most perfect shopping experience, product arrived on time, I intended to come back soon for another purchase.
If you liked this product don't hesitate to buy it. The material is beautiful and durable, at the same time it is suitable for any occasion you might want to attend.

  • Regular waist

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: If you liked this product dont hesitate to buy it. The material is beautiful and durable, at the same time it is suitable for any occasion you might want to attend.
I bought it as a present but the packaging was not as beautiful as I requested. I still vote 4 stars because the product itself was amazing.
The most perfect shopping experience, product arrived on time, I intended to come back soon for another purchase.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="90"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1466572981768{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="50"][vc_column_text]

Details

  • - Wash and clean gently to avoid damage.
  • -Order the product 3-4 days before your due date.
  • - Customizations are possible based on customer request.
[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="35"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Vitrine products are guaranteed to benefit from the highest quality products and the most trusted brands around the globe. Our main intention is to gain our customers trust and make them a secure and win-win shopping experience. We may not be the best but we are trying hard to be the best.
